ngiemboon: Cʉ̀apʉ̀a gɔɔn né mèŋ ngie: «Lɔgɔ lékwoŋo manzwě gẅie tsɔ̌ mámbàŋa kwoŋo yé, ńgʉa né mvfò; á manzwě gẅie à gÿo gÿɛ́; kwoŋo yé páʼ mèŋ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a n kwoŋ pʉ̀a Ésàlayɛ! É pʉ̀a Ésàlayɛ pie é cʉ́me nzèm tsɔ́ messé, ḿbiŋ ńkwoŋo kèkɔ̀ɔn ntɔ̌ɔn tÿǒ melùʼ.»
en: Then the Lord said to me, “Go again; show love to a woman who is loved by another man and is an adulteress,   just as the Lord loves the Israelites though they turn to other gods and love raisin cakes.”  # 3:1 2Sm 6:19; 1Ch 16:3; Sg 2:5

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n ka gíŋ ńkẅé nzwě wɔ̀ɔn, ńgwaa kẅé, ńná nkáb pàg ntsɔ̀b tʉ̂a né legém né ngesáŋ ntsíŋ gie mé tóŋo lê ɔ̂ɔjÿè mekílò nkÿo lekùɔ né móm tʉ̂a.
en: So I bought her for fifteen shekels of silver and nine bushels of barley.  ,# 3:2 Lit silver, a homer of barley, and a lethek of barley,# 3:2 Ru 4:10

ngiemboon: N da gɔɔn né yé ngie: Pɔ̀gɔ ge zye tsẅé, ɔ̀ le gíŋ ńgÿo gÿɛ́ wɔ́, pi lâ mbàŋa le gíŋ ńnuŋe wɔ́; n gíŋe ńgÿo yɔ́ɔn pɔ́ puʼu na gù.
en: I said to her, “You are to live with me many days. You must not be promiscuous or belong to any man, and I will act the same way toward you.”

ngiemboon: Á nue pʉ̀a Ésàlayɛ ge gÿo néŋe tɛʼ te fùɔ, te nyìŋ gẅie à ge sáʼa wɔ́b, te tóon gẅie pɔ́ lɔ̌g ńgÿo yɔb Ssé. Pɔ́ le gíŋe nuŋe pwɔʼ wɔ́, pɔ́ le gẅiin shúm ndʉalʉ̌a sie pɔ́ ge lɔg zsé mmó gie Ssé ne ńkwoŋo wɔ́.
en: For the Israelites must live many days without king or prince,   without sacrifice  # 3:4 Dn 9:27; 11:31; 12:11; Hs 2:11 or sacred pillar,  # 3:4 Hs 10:1–2 and without ephod  # 3:4 Ex 28:4–12; 1Sm 23:9–12 or household idols.  # 3:4 Gn 31:19,34; Jdg 17:5; 18:14,17

ngiemboon: Púʼu la, pɔ́ piŋ nzèm ńtsɛ́ɛ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a Ssé yɔb, pɔ́ sele nnɛ́ ńgʉa ńtsɛ́ɛ yé, ńgʉa ńtsɛ́ mbɔɔ fùɔ wɔb gẅie mé la zyé yé na tsìŋendá fùɔ Ndavîd. Pɔ́ ge gÿo gwaa piŋ nzèm léfaʼa Cʉ̀apʉ̀a, ńjÿó pìi menò mbòŋo mé, é giŋe cÿɔʼɔ tà vɛɛ.
en: Afterward, the people of Israel will return   and seek the Lord their God and David their king.  # 3:5 Is 11:1–10; Jr 23:5–6; 33:15–16; Ezk 34:24; Rm 11:23 They will come with awe to the Lord   # 3:5 Jr 31:9 and to his goodness in the last days.
